memberdef.name: LV_RADIUS_CIRCLE
memberdef.initializer: (LV_COORD_MAX) /*A very big radius to always draw as circle*/

detaileddescription.para:
Copy a style to an other
dest
pointer to the destination style
src
pointer to the source style

memberdef.argsstring: (const lv_style_t *start, const lv_style_t *end, lv_style_t *res, uint16_t ratio)
memberdef.name: lv_style_mix

detaileddescription.para:
Mix two styles according to a given ratio
start
start style
end
end style
res
store the result style here
ratio
the ratio of mix [0..256]; 0: start style; 256: end style

parameterdescription.para: pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
pointer to the style to animate
pointer to a style to animate from (start value)
pointer to a style to animate to (end value)

detaileddescription.para:
Set the duration and delay of an animation
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
duration
duration of the animation in milliseconds
delay
delay before the animation in milliseconds

Set a function call when the animation is ready
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
ready_cb
a function call when the animation is ready

Make the animation to play back to when the forward direction is ready
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
wait_time
time in milliseconds to wait before starting the back direction

Disable playback. (Disabled after lv_anim_init())
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable

Make the animation to start again when ready.
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
wait_time
time in milliseconds to wait before starting the animation again

Disable repeat. (Disabled after lv_anim_init())
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable

Set a user specific data for the animation
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
user_data
the user data

Get the user data
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
the user data

Get pointer to the user data
a
pointer to an initialized lv_anim_t variable
pointer to the user data

Create an animation
a
an initialized 'anim_t' variable. Not required after call.
